title: SaaS multiple compression, downturn outlook & advice for new VCs with Jason Lemkin of SaaStr | E1461
description: Jason and Molly chat with Jason Lemkin of SaaStr (01:44). They discuss: advice for new VCs (16:14), the future	of SaaS investing (27:37), playing offense as investors (35:50), secondaries and more.
